OngAJ has a background in lean manufacturing and kaizen from his previous role as an engineer. He's currently in the process of transitioning into the field of Data Science. His journey has been one of self-discovery and passionate learning. He's eager to combine his newfound Data Science skills with his engineering background to drive data-driven insights and make a meaningful impact in the Data Science domain.

OngAJ earned his Master's Degree in Chemical Engineering with a focus on Oil and Gas Technology in 2020. He graduated with a 2:1 Second-class Honors. His final year thesis, titled 'Recovery of Starch Residues from Sago Effluent using Natural Coagulants

After graduation, OngAJ started his career at Daikin Malaysia Sdn Bhd as a Production Engineer. In this role, he was responsible for various aspects of production management, including production planning, team management, workflow optimization, quality enhancement, and cost-saving initiatives. He worked at Daikin for 1 year and 6 months.

For his second job, OngAJ joined NXP Malaysia Sdn Bhd as a Wire-Bond Equipment Engineer (Front-end BGA). In this role, he was responsible for managing K&S Wire Bonder machines and Post Wire Bond Inspection (AOI) machines, overseeing their operation, maintenance, and performance optimization. OngAJ worked at NXP Malaysia for 6 months

During OngAJ's time at NXP Semiconductor, he developed a deep passion for data science and remains dedicated to turning it into his full-time career. He's currently committed to intensive self-study, focusing on Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Data Analytics, Natural Language Processing and relational databases.

Simultaneously, he's taken the initiative to create a personal portfolio website where he proudly exhibits a variety of data science projects that highlight his growing expertise. You're welcome to explore these projects in the 'Projects' section on his website
Type !info for information on what type of questions you may ask me :)
OngAJ always has a hunger for competitiveness. He enjoys playing competitive video games, engaging in competitive sports, and going on hiking adventures.

patterns: how many language can he speak?
responses: OngAJ is fluent in English, Mandarin and Bahasa Melayu. He is also capable of understanding and speaking Hokkien and Cantonese but with limited proficiency

OngAJ possesses a strong foundation in Data Analytics, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing and relational databases. For a more detailed information about his technical skills, please review his resume OngAJ's Resume or you can find his skills listed on this website's 'Skills' section. Additionally, you can explore some of his data science projects on this portfolio website!
